allowedZones.name: Documentation
allowedZones.notes: Safe for Tier B/C verification updates and governance docs.

allowedZones.name: VerificationScripts
allowedZones.notes: Node-native checks only; no global test runner changes.

verificationRules.gaCriticalWork: Must reference Tier A/B/C artifact before merge.
verificationRules.legacyMode: New files cannot self-designate legacy mode; exemptions require documented issue and owner.
verificationRules.provenance: Changes must cite evidence artifacts in PR summaries.

restrictedAreas.name: Secrets
restrictedAreas.notes: Credential and secret material are human-only unless explicitly overridden.

restrictedAreas.name: SecurityHardening
restrictedAreas.notes: Defense-in-depth policy, attestations, and trust stores require human review.

restrictedAreas.name: ProductionInfra
restrictedAreas.notes: Production infrastructure definitions cannot be modified by agents without a human override.

activityTracking.policy: Log branches/PRs, agent owner, and status for every task change.

stopConditions: Tooling instability that blocks deterministic verification
Requests to bypass Legacy Mode guardrails
Attempts to change Jest or pnpm global configuration

escalation.instructions: Pause changes and open a governance issue when stop conditions are met.
